spiritsExplanation: The primary spirit of this workout video is 'Soothing & Restorative,' evidenced by numerous indicators throughout the metadata. Given these strong indicators, the assignment of 'Soothing & Restorative' with a very high score is justified. Overall, the classification is highly confident, supported by explicit metadata cues and user interactions.
